inclusion.criterion: participants must complete routine check-in and sign consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: confirmed diagnosis of right or left temporal lobe epilepsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: neurological disease confirmed by MRI study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: referred from an attorney or part of personal injury claim
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: intoxicated from alcohol or other illicit substance
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching and generalized shaking, which required valium to cease seizure activity.
